description: With the body of a god and a big dick to die for, Adonis totally lives up to his name. Gianni Luca gives him a run for the money with brooding good looks and a beautiful, round bubble butt that's perfect for fucking. Question is... who's going to come out on top and who's going to have their ass pounded hard and deep? Raw, manly aggression and hot, sexy action make this one match that is guaranteed to get your juices flowing.
title: Gianni Luca vs Adonis
